about_the_game: Follow the journey of Ortega, a determined detective with Latin roots, as she investigates a series of mysterious crimes and disappearances in her city. Her path crosses with an eccentric journalist, who draws her into a world filled with secrets and shadows. In the background, a dark cult seems to be connected to the missing girls and mysterious events. This comic sheds light on corruption, conspiracies, and dark secrets lurking in the shadows of the Sanestone streets
